Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class PlayerHand

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.PlayerHand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class PlayerHand
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class provides methods and attributes to manage every card the player has during the game, giving an easy way to update, add or remove them.
    Author:
    Stefano Formicola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PlayerHand()
      When a new player instance is created it calls the default constructor of PlayerHand without parameters because all the data structures must be empty.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPowerup​(Powerup powerup)
      Adds a powerup to the player's deck of powerups
      java.lang.Integer getAmmosAmount​(AmmoColor color)
      Returns the amount of cubes of the specified color
      java.util.List<Powerup> getPowerups()
      Returns the structure containing player's powerups
      java.util.List<Weapon> getWeapons()
      Returns the structure containing player's weapons
      void setWeapons​(java.util.List<Weapon> weapons)
      Updates the list of weapons of the player
      void updateAmmos​(AmmoColor ammoColor, java.lang.Integer amount)
      This method updates the number of cubes a player has
      void wastePowerup​(Powerup powerup)
      This method deletes a powerup from the hand of the player.

      • getAmmosAmount

        public java.lang.Integer getAmmosAmount​(AmmoColor color)
        Returns the amount of cubes of the specified color
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • setWeapons

        public void setWeapons​(java.util.List<Weapon> weapons)
        Updates the list of weapons of the player
        Parameters:
        weapons - the list of weapons to update
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if a null pointer is passed as parameter

      • addPowerup

        public void addPowerup​(Powerup powerup)
        Adds a powerup to the player's deck of powerups
        Parameters:
        powerup - the powerup to add to the player's list
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if a null pointer is passed as parameter
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there's already the maximum number of powerups allowed

      • updateAmmos

        public void updateAmmos​(AmmoColor ammoColor,
                        java.lang.Integer amount)
        This method updates the number of cubes a player has
        Parameters:
        ammoColor - the color of the cubes
        amount - the amount of cubes to increment or decrement
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the total number of ammos is less than zero or the ammoColor parameter is none

      • wastePowerup

        public void wastePowerup​(Powerup powerup)
        This method deletes a powerup from the hand of the player. It is called after that it has been used or wasted.
        Parameters:
        powerup - it's the powerup to remove.
